settings_text: ⚙Settings • Here you can change bot's language
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong... Please, contact the developer to solve issue: @MasterArthur
start: Hey, {0}! I am the bot that will help you manage your media content. How? - It's simple: send me a text/file/audio/sticker/photo/gif/voice/video/contact/location and keywords for quick search in the add media menu and conveniently share it in all chats via the inline menu
my_media_text: 🖼My Media ✏️Edit - delete, change the visibility of media, keywords 🔵🟡 Public media - view public media
add_media_text: Send me a text/file/audio/sticker/photo/gif/voice/video/contact/location you want to save
keywords_text: Send me keywords you want for this media
unsupported_type: ❌Unsupported media type! Bot supports only text/file/audio/sticker/photo/gif/voice/video/contact/location types
